synopsis.text:
Ilfa's counsel and Maaryan's ill-fated science experiment propel a group of friends into an unforeseen journey within an RPG world. To escape this virtual realm and return to their mundane lives, they must vanquish the final boss. However, even after achieving victory, they remain trapped. Their only hope lies in locating a mysterious black and shiny object.

Based on the popular RPG game 'ToHeart 2 Dungeon Travelers' released in 2011 for PlayStation Portable, this two-volume OVA series announced by Amazon Japan combines elements of romance and fantasy. The characters hail from the ToHeart2 visual novel franchise by AQUAPLUS, now finding themselves in an immersive role-playing game setting. Embark on this thrilling adventure with them, as they navigate through challenges and surprises in search of their way home.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
